title: Spider-Man's Tom Holland shaves off his luscious curls
text:
Spider-Man’s Tom Holland shaves his luscious curls (Picture: Instagram/Twitter)

Spider-Man star Tom Holland has gone and shaved off his luscious curls and we are there for it.

A video of the 23-year-old emerged online after the actor filmed a message to one of his fans.

But despite giving a shout out and holding up a peace sign, fans were more alarmed by the fact his hair had completely vanished.

Taking to Twitter, they commented on the short clip – and let’s just say his fandom have a lot of feelings.

‘Are you actually serious??? I still love him but I want his hair back,’ one stated, while another proceeded to call him a ‘hairless beautiful cat to be exact’.

Because of course.

Thank you @TomHolland1996 for taking time out today to meet with @ClevelandVAMC veterans. Cant wait to see #Cherry in its entirety… also she loved the video. pic.twitter.com/7QNrYEapDZ — Art (@artdav) October 7, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

References to Eminem were thrown around as someone else shared: ‘How dare he do that.’

However, the general consensus appears to be good as a number of people told the star just how well he pulled off the look.

It is rumoured that Tom has shaved his locks for an upcoming role in the 2020 movie Cherry, but this is yet to be confirmed.

The post came just days after the Marvel star took announced he would be taking a break from social media.

Fans are there for it (Picture: Rex)

Next to a picture of himself posing with his dog on Instagram, he wrote: ‘My Pooch and Me. Off now to go begin my latest venture with the @therussobrothers.

‘I’m going to be taking a short break from Instagram, so see you all in the not so distant future.’

Just recently it was announced that Spider-Man has returned to the MCU, and Tom couldn’t have been more pleased.

Speaking on Jimmy Kimmel Live, Disney CEO Robert Iger revealed just how hard the Peter Parker star fought the film’s corner.

‘He said something and it was clear that the fans wanted Tom back as Spider-Man,’ he explained.

‘It was clear that [Holland] cared so much. He’s a great Spider-Man,’ Iger added. ‘I felt for him and it was clear that the fans wanted all of this to happen.’
